data.text:
The Charlotte Bobcats were a team in the National Basketball Association. They competed in the Eastern Conference. They were renamed the Charlotte Hornets.

Coaching History[]

2003-2007: Bernie Bickerstaff

2007-2008: Sam Vincent

2008-2010: Larry Brown

2010-2012: Paul Silas

2012-2013: Mike Dunlap

2013-2014: Steve Clifford

Facts[]

Location: Charlotte, North Carolina

Arena: Time Warner Cable Arena

Standing[]

The Charlotte Bobcats finished their last season as the Bobcats with a record 43 - 39. They finished 7th in the Eastern Conference.
